skills.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
skills.description: Extensive experience with Terraform, working on complex projects across all major cloud providers

skills.title: CI/CD
skills.description: Using various CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions to automate workflows and manage environments, with a focus on GitOps principles

skills.title: Kubernetes
skills.description: Deploying and managing applications with Helm, ArgoCD, and implementing effective rollout strategies to ensure scalable and reliable operations

skills.title: Monitoring
skills.description: Using Prometheus, Grafana, and cloud tools for app and infrastructure monitoring, creating alerts, and performing root cause analysis
